abstract: New Brazilian finance minister Nelson Barbosa says country's economy is improving, despite chaotic atmosphere.
lead_paragraph: Nelson Barbosa, on the job for less than two days, tried to assure skeptics that Latin America’s largest economy was “starting to get better.”

headline.main: New Finance Minister in Brazil Seeks to Counter Pessimism
headline.print_headline: Brazil’s New Finance Minister Tries to Counter Pessimism

snippet: Nelson Barbosa, on the job for less than two days, tried to assure skeptics that Latin America’s largest economy was “starting to get better.”
